title: Re installed Windows 11, can't get new Thunderbird to recognize existing mail data
content:
I had to install Windows 11 fresh because of multiple issues with my PC (I upgraded from 10 to 11 6 months ago). I installed Thunderbird fresh, and am trying to get it to see my existing data with is on my D drive. I browsed to the folder in Account Settings, but it's not showing up. I have years of mail and don't want to lose it.

There are too many options in the help for me to know which are actually related to my situation. I thought I was ready to do this, but am surprised at how difficult it is compared to the last time I did something similar.

Any help, even just pointing me to the right place to look for help, is appreciated!

Thanks!
creator: RagtopDwarf

title: Unable to send or receive e-mails
content:
The receiving and messaging has been intermittent over the last few days. The latest message came in at 07:45 this morning

David Malin ([edited[ @davidmalin.com), phone [edited from community support forum]
creator: malin.david

title: Why doesn't Thunderbird get all my mail when i click on the "Get Messages" Cloud icon top left corner under file menu?
content:
Hello,

I just switched to Thunderbird from Outlook and so far it seems nice but one problem when I click on the get messages cloud icon on the top left of the screen I receive no incoming messages. Now if I go to one particular email account (I have 8 email accounts) and right click and left click on get messages, new messages come in.

So my questions is, why doesn't all my mail come in when I click on the get messages icon? Am i misinterpreting this?

Thank you!
creator: wm8

title: Account colour??......in Betterbird 'Yes' but not Thunderbird....any suggestions or work arounds
content:
TOPIC 1 In Betterbird there is the option to colour the email account. The only option in TB is to change the colour of the email envelope icon. There used to be a extension that achieved this but fell by the wayside in TB 115 I researched this on TB forum on reddit.... https://www.reddit.com/r/Thunderbird/comments/17unvb1/different_account_colors_in_thunderbird_115/

It made interesting reading and I did download the 'account colours' zip to install and see if it worked. Only thing is that I do not know how to install it........can someone brighter than me tell me how to install it and to remove it if it doesn't work. Many thanks.
creator: michaelwayne69

title: Betterbird v Thunderbird ??
content:
Any user views on Betterbird over TB. The developer has done a great job and has one thing I do like and that is the ability to colour the highlighted email account rather than just the envelope icon. Experiences are appreciated so I can make the informed decision on which to use. Should I decide to use it how does one just port TB and its settings over to Betterbird.?

Thanks for views.
creator: michaelwayne69

title: mail inviate
content: Buon giorno, non trovo alcune mail inviate, non riesco a visualizzare il messaggio. Grazie per la collaborazione

title: Thunderbird Delivery Status Notification
content: In Thunderbird, when sending e-mail, Delivery Status Notification worked fine for years, but it has stopped working ¿how can I fix it?
creator: luiscoda

title: Thundebird android - u zpráv ve spamu chybí volba "NENÍ NEVYŽÁDANÁ".
content: Dobrý den. V tabletu mám Thunderbird android 14. Verzi syst. android 12. Ve zprávách ve spamu nemohu zprávu označit že není nevyžádaná, aby se přesunula do Doručené pošty a příště už neskončila ve spamu. Chybí volba "NENÍ NEVYŽÁDANÁ". Prosím o pomoc, jak to nastavit. V PC Windows Thunderbird pracuje bez problému.
creator: pavlik551

title: impossible to add the gmail.com email account
content: Hello, It is impossible to add the gmail.com email account. The SMTP service is not recognized by Thunderbird. This issue seems to have appeared after I changed the password of my Google account. Thank you for your help.
creator: cmarket

title: Sort sub folders in email account folders
content: Can the order of the sub folders in email account folders be re ordered. Is the add on "manually sort folders" still available? I there another method of doing this.
creator: ericathroll

title: Overzetten Thunderbird naar nieuwe computer
content:
Ik heb al jaren Thunderbird op mijn laptop draaien, met volle tevredenheid.

Vanwege de overgang naar Windows 11 heb ik een nieuwe laptop aangeschaft en nu wil ik Thunderbird op die laptop gebruiken. Ik heb Thunderbird proberen te installeren op de nieuwe computer, echter ik krijg als foutmelding : "Uw Thunderbird profiel kan niet worden geladen. Het is mogelijk niet aanwezig of ontoegankelijk."

Wat doe ik fout ? Graag jullie hulp.

Groet, Jan
creator: jerm.postma

title: THUNDERBIRD SU TRE DISPOSITIVI NON SI PARLANO
content:
Buongiorno, ho installato Thunderbird su tre dipositivi (Desktop, Tablet Android e smartphone android) ma non si parlano tra loro: se invio mail con desktop non è visibile sugli altri due dispositivi e viceversa, devo cancellare le mail tre volte (in pratica su ogni dispositivo). Thunderbird si comporta come se fossero tre programmi diversi. L'unica cosa che li collega è che se leggo una mail su un dispositivo risulta letta anche sugli altri. Inoltre con lo smartphone android ho delle difficoltà quando invio le mail: mi dice sempre che non sono inviate ma in realtà lo sono. Rimango in attesa di Vs istruzioni/suggerimanti. Grazie Mauro

Good morning, I installed Thunderbird on three devices (Desktop, Android tablet, and Android smartphone), but they don't communicate with each other: if I send emails on the desktop, it's not visible on the other two devices, and vice versa. I have to delete the emails three times (basically on each device). Thunderbird behaves as if they were three different programs. The only thing that connects them is that if I read an email on one device, it appears read on the others. I also have trouble sending emails on my Android smartphone: it always says they haven't been sent, but they actually are. I'm waiting for your instructions/suggestions. Thank you.

Mauro
creator: fm5601
